info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 2:40PM MDT until August 12 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Mineral County in west central Montana... South central Sanders County in northwestern Montana... * Until 315 PM MDT. * At 240 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near De Borgia, or 18 miles south of Thompson Falls, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Borgia, Haugan and St. Regis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
